price: 74. Respondieron: «(No, pero) nuestros antepasados hacían lo mismo».
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
